snippet: An attack on a 12-year-old, brought on, perhaps, by an obsession with the fictional Internet figure Slender Man, has forced an urgent self-examination in Waukesha, Wis.
abstract: Stabbing attack by two 12-year-old girls on a friend and schoolmate, brought on perhaps by an obsession with the fictional Internet figure Slender Man, has forced an urgent self-examination in Waukesha, Wis; victim, described by doctors as close to certain death at the time she was found by a passerby, is recovering; girls are charged as adults with attempted murder, but case may be returned to juvenile court.

byline.original: By MONICA DAVEY and STEVEN YACCINO
byline.contributor: Susan Beachy and Sheelagh McNeill contributed research.

lead_paragraph: An attack on a 12-year-old, brought on, perhaps, by an obsession with the fictional Internet figure Slender Man, has forced an urgent self-examination in Waukesha, Wis.

headline.main: Milwaukee Suburb Tries to Cope With Girl’s Stabbing
headline.print_headline: Milwaukee Suburb Tries to Cope With Girl’s Stabbing
